examples: They were all involved to a greater or lesser degree (= some were more involved than others).
Todos estaban involucrados en mayor o menor grado (= algunos estaban más involucrados que otros).
The law was designed to protect wives, and, to a lesser extent, children.
La ley fue diseñada para proteger a las esposas y, en menor medida, a los niños.
He was encouraged to plead guilty to the lesser offence.
Se le animó a declararse culpable del delito menor.
